info.name: SSS Scheduling API
info.description: Test collection for the OR-Tools School Scheduling API

request.description: Check if the API is running
Simple schedule: 1 teacher, 1 course (90 min), 1 hall
Schedule respecting teacher preference for Tuesday 9-11am
Multiple teachers and courses with teacher busy period
Verify that classes are NOT scheduled during teacher busy periods
Practical course should be scheduled in lab, not lecture room
Impossible schedule: 3000 minutes of course in 2 hours of operational time. Should return INFEASIBLE.
